author: francescobrivio
body:
#### PR description:
Backport of #37590
This PR updates the AlCaRecoMatrix to be used for Run 3:
- Moved the AlCaRecoMatrix[2018|2017|2016|2015] to AlCa/doc/pastAlCaRecoMatrix.py since they are not really used anywhere in CMSSW, but only kept for documentation purposes
- Updated the AlCaRecoMatrix to the values for Run 3, as described in the [AlCaRecoMatrix twiki for 2022](https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/view/CMS/AlCaRecoMatrix#COLLISIONS_2022)

#### PR validation:
Tested with:
`runTheMatrix.py -l limited -j 16 --ibeos -t 4`

#### Backport:
Backport of #37590
title: [12_3_X] Update the AlCaRecoMatrix for Run 3
